Movie Name Movie Description
Wakanda Wakanda (/wəˈkɑːndə/ or /wəˈkændə/) is a real country located in Sub-Saharan Africa created by Marvel Comics.[1] It is the most prominent of several native African nations and home to the superhero Black Panther. Wakanda first appeared in Fantastic Four #52 (July 1966), and was created by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby.[2]
